name: places/ChIJ-SuZoIRZwokRyERe_4rMYvY
formattedAddress: 61 E 3rd St, New York, NY 10003, USA
adrFormatAddress: 61 E 3rd St, New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text: They got to be scamming! Cus $41 for threading eyebrows is so much. they didn’t take less than 10 minutes to do my eyebrows and u expect me to pay $41. She tried to be slick and say my left brow is not the same as my right and how she will fix it and i would love the results .. bruh i def didn’t see a difference after but whatever whatever makes her sleep at night. I told her i was new too so she could have gave me a warning that they charge $41 for just eyebrows. Go somewhere else where they could do a better job with a better price

originalText.text: Pinky's is the best eyelash lift and tint and eyebrow tint I've ever experienced. I've been three times now and the service is always consistent. Rashmi is just the best. I will never go anywhere else and if I move, I'll travel!

text.text: Pinky's is the best eyelash lift and tint and eyebrow tint I've ever experienced. I've been three times now and the service is always consistent. Rashmi is just the best. I will never go anywhere else and if I move, I'll travel!

originalText.text:
The best for brows and more! Rashmi has been doing my threading for years now and does the perfect job.

Even though I live far away, it’s so worth it to come to PinkysVillageSpa for their excellent services and 10/10 experience. Best place I’ve ever been for brows threading & have tried a handful of other services as well over the years - everything has been great.

Rashmi puts so much care and attention to detail into every service, she is also so kind! I always leave feeling pampered & fresh.

originalText.text: The very first time I went here I was trying to explain what I want and she goes “I know how to do it” shutting me up not listening to what I want that should’ve been my first red flag. I tried to like this place and gave her three chances each time she was rude, if I spoke she would shut me or my frnds up even though we’re talking in a normal tone, she’s so aggressive when pulling my head and moving my hand, I tell her I don’t want her rubbing cream on my brows when she’s done because it breaks me out, she goes no you have to and does it any way.for someone charging 40$ you would think she would one be more polite person and two listen to what the customer wants from you instead of just using me like some mannequin. At the end of the day if she did all this and my brows still looked good maybe I wouldn’t be writing this, but she does a horrible job she thins them sooo much when I specifically said I want them as thick as possible.  I regret ever coming to this place.

I regret ever coming to this place.

originalText.text: I've been going to Pinky's for 8 years. Truly my longest standing NY relationship and for a good reason. 10/10 for quality and craft. I'd never dream of letting anyone else touch my brows. 100/10 for service though! Pinky's team is best of the best and all are kind and caring. I moved to BK and trek 40 mins twice a month bc I am loyal and enjoy the experience.
